= Git =

== diff or same ==

svn revert   - git checkout
svn update   - git pull
svn commit   - git push
svn log      - git log
svn checkout - git clone

== 技巧 ==

颜色

{{{
git config --global color.diff auto
}}}

== Git/SVN ==

迁移：

{{{
svn log svn://xxx --xml | grep -P "^<author" | sort -u | perl -pe 's/<author>(.*?)<\/author>/$1 = <$1\@example.com>/' > users.txt
}}}

问题：可能会差个东8区，时区的考虑
